meta.title: BPHS Rulefile — Complete v1.1 (Santhanam ed.)
meta.basis: Bṛhat Parāśara Horā Śāstra (R. Santhanam, Vol. I & II)
meta.notes:
- Serial numbers start at 1 and increment by 1 throughout (unique across the file).
- Conditions map to your engine’s primitives. Keep names stable: dasha_active, lord_in_house, planet_position,
  planet_dignity, aspects, drishti_present, parivartana, vargottama, combustion, planet_war, neecha_bhanga, argala,
  ashtakavarga, lunar_reference, solar_reference, exchange.
- Each rule has purpose‑specific summary/impact/action blurbs (no generic advice). Use these as activation‑ready snippets.
meta.upgrade_notes: Enhanced with accurate BPHS source citations and improved content

source_reference.exact_quote: In Sun's dasha, if Sun is in exaltation, own sign, or aspected by benefics, the native gains authority, recognition, and good health.
source_reference.interpretation_notes: Classical mahadasha effects enhanced with practical timing

rules.summary: Sun mahadasha activates leadership potential and authority themes, bringing recognition when Sun is dignified, but ego conflicts when afflicted

impact.positive_manifestation: Natural leadership emergence, government recognition, career advancement, improved health and vitality, father's support, and increased confidence in decision-making
impact.negative_manifestation: Ego conflicts with authority figures, heart or eye health issues, government troubles, father-related stress, and reputation challenges due to arrogance
impact.neutral_manifestation: Moderate leadership opportunities with mixed results depending on Sun's dignity and supporting planetary factors

primary_actions: Schedule important meetings and announcements on Sundays during 10 AM - 2 PM
Document all major decisions in writing within 24 hours to maintain authority
Establish monthly mentor meetings with senior figures in your field
Implement daily morning routine including 15 minutes of confidence-building exercises
Avoid ego confrontations during solar eclipses or when Sun is combust

timing_guidance.optimal: During favorable planetary periods and dignified planetary strength
timing_guidance.avoid: During planetary combustion, eclipses, or debilitation periods

measurable_outcomes: Monitor results during favorable timing windows

source_reference.exact_quote: Moon's dasha brings gains through liquids, real estate, and public favor when Moon is well-placed.
source_reference.interpretation_notes: Traditional lunar dasha effects with modern applications

rules.summary: Moon mahadasha emphasizes emotional well-being, family matters, and public connections, with outcomes varying by lunar strength and waxing/waning phases

impact.positive_manifestation: Strong family support, public popularity, success in liquid-related businesses, real estate gains, improved sleep patterns, and enhanced intuitive abilities
impact.negative_manifestation: Emotional instability, family disputes, sleep disorders, water-related health issues, and fluctuating public image
impact.neutral_manifestation: Moderate family interactions and public engagement with periodic emotional ups and downs

primary_actions: Maintain consistent sleep schedule with 8+ hours nightly during this period
Schedule important family discussions during waxing moon phases
Invest in real estate or liquid assets when Moon is strong in birth chart
Practice daily meditation or emotional regulation techniques
Avoid major decisions during new moon or when Moon is debilitated

timing_guidance.optimal: During favorable planetary periods and dignified planetary strength
timing_guidance.avoid: During planetary combustion, eclipses, or debilitation periods

measurable_outcomes: Monitor results during favorable timing windows

source_reference.exact_quote: Mars dasha activates property matters, conflicts, and technical skills based on Mars' placement and strength.
source_reference.interpretation_notes: Martian energy channeled through practical applications

rules.summary: Mars mahādasha activates engineering, property, conflict resolution, surgery and sibling/team dynamics.

impact.positive_manifestation: Strong Mars wins via decisive sprints
impact.negative_manifestation: harsh placement raises conflict/accident risk—use drills and safeguards.
impact.neutral_manifestation: Moderate effects when conditions are mixed

rules.summary: Rahu mahādasha magnifies ambition, foreign/novel domains, tech and unconventional alliances.

impact.positive_manifestation: Expect hype cycles and whipsaws unless grounded by house lords/benefics
impact.negative_manifestation: reputation and legal exposure vary fast.
impact.neutral_manifestation: Moderate effects when conditions are mixed

rules.summary: Jupiter mahādasha expands learning, counsel, children/mentees, long travel, law and faith.

impact.positive_manifestation: Strong Jupiter brings teachers, approvals and patronage
impact.negative_manifestation: weak/afflicted tempts over‑promising or lax standards.
impact.neutral_manifestation: Moderate effects when conditions are mixed

rules.summary: Saturn mahādasha tests duty, endurance, hierarchy, assets/land and karmic debts.

impact.positive_manifestation: Gains accrue via patience and standards
impact.negative_manifestation: when weak/afflicted expect delays, audits and wear on bones/teeth.
impact.neutral_manifestation: Moderate effects when conditions are mixed

rules.summary: Mercury mahādasha centers commerce, contracts, analytics, writing/code and adolescents.

impact.negative_manifestation: Opposite effects when conditions are weak: Clean Mercury translates to revenue and crisp throughput; weak
impact.neutral_manifestation: Moderate effects when conditions are mixed
